TITLE GOES HERE: Use the `dbConnect_scidb` function to connect to the `airlines` database to answer the following problem.
Of all the destinations from Chicago O'Hare (ORD), which were the most common in 2010? 

 
<!--begin-answer-->
 Connection to database: 
```{r, warning = FALSE, message= FALSE}
library(RMySQL)
con <- mdsr::dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "airlines")
```

```{sql, connection=con}
SELECT 
  dest, 
  sum(1) as numFlights
FROM flights 
WHERE year = 2010 
  AND origin = "ORD"
GROUP BY dest
ORDER BY numFlights desc
LIMIT 0,6
```  
  
<!--end-answer-->
